commands.name: ES Training v1 randproj for CIFAR10 and LeNet with 128 dimensions
commands.command: python es_trainer_v1.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --num_iterations 1 --epochs 100 --ws_type randproj --es_std 0.1 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128
